Articles.Content:
Floor 5132

Your interview, with Simon The Digger as your Interviewer...
Floor 5133 the entire building gets sucked into m87 black hole and goes to another universe.
5134: you panic about the alternate universe before realizing it's just another galaxy.

Floor 5135

Simon The Digger realize that you need help, so he brought you back before getting back to Floor 5132

Floor 5136 :

Outside thw window, you see a Boeing 747-8i, Airbus A380-841, Antonov An-225 Mriya and a Hughes H-4 Spruce Goose (Re-engined with Allison T56 turboprops) flying into 4 Zeppelins. You felt strange since none of those plabes ever cruise at this altituds. Then, all four planes survived ramming into the airships and none of the planes ever caught on fire, but RIP the airships crew nonetheless.

Floor 5137: you notice the floor looks like mars,  with its red sand,  near orange sky, and....   Something that looks like a runix cube.  Ignoring that,  you fly to the next room.

Visual here. DISCLAIMER: I DID NOT TAKE IT.  PARADOX INITIATIVE  DID!

Spoiler

5138: As you walk up, you fall on the ceiling. Above you (below you?) is a table, chair, and MacBook (on the table). You portal up to the stairs (because science has shown that portadevices) and move on
5139: you fall (or fly up??) to the floor, with 2% battery charge on the phone left.
5140: You realize you're just a bit above halfway to the summit of Olympus Mons.

5141 : An airport departure and arrival hall. Strangely, a Space Shuttle is hooked up to the jetbridge and suspended in midair. Since you're almost running out of battery, you went to the nearest charging booth. Unfortunately, every single USB and Samsung USB Type-C chargers have been occupied, leaving only Apple USB Type-C chargers left to charge your iPhone.

In the same time, you've shocked to see how many Android users are there, which majority are Samsung users, compared to iOS, within the terminal.

Edited April 28, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian
5142: Driving rain. There were umbrellas offered, but idiot you didn’t take them. You are soaked.

Floor: 5143

You find yourself in a nice room, looks like of the Hilton sweets.

As you look around you see what you needed for a long time: A universal charger! You also see a garbage disposal.

There is just one problem... it will take your phone and send it 20 floors up, but you will have a 100% charge.

So you put your phone in and now you can not having the feeling of your phone dyeing at any moment.

(Though you wonder why the garbage disposal and the universal charger look the same, and there was a post-it note that said "universal charger")

 

 

Edited May 10, 2019 by The_Arcitect
Floor 5144- As you enter the floor you suddenly start to speak in different fonts and even colors which is pretty weird. You leave.

Floor 5145: complete recreation of the bridge of the "Enterprise"

Edited May 7, 2019 by Seanburg2006
Wrong Floor
5146: You question why you ever sent your phone up 20 floors... 17 to go.
5147 : A Samsung S10 Plus with full charge. You take it and bring it as your backup phone.

5148: Nothingness.

 

 

 

 

oh look a door

Floor 5149: You notice there is a Universal Phone Storage Place (UPSP) It is only now that you realize that you may have put your phone in the garbage disposal unit on floor 5143, well you were able to get a free phone that has a battery that every floor you go up, the phone charges 1%.

 

 

You feel better about the fact that every charger will work on the phone.

Floor 5150 : You realize that you're still 13 floors away from your iPhone's pickup point and your Galaxy S10 Plus has not even a SIM Catd inserted. Oh, you also realized you have the Dual-SIM variant, which the SD Slot also doubles as the 2nd SIM slot.

You found 3 SIM Cards from 3 different brands; Celcom, Vodafone and Verizon. As well as an SD Card. Alongside them is a notice with the text "SIM Tray Opener on 5151".

You took all four cards inside your pocket. While walking up to the next floor, you're thinking on which 2 of the 4 cards you wanna insert and how to elect which 2 cards will go into the phone.

(Since the SIM Tray Opener is at the next floor, you might consider installing two of the cards ASAP)

Edited May 9, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian
Floor 5151: You see a wild Pikachu! It used thunderbolt! You fainted!

Floor 5152 :

A floor with worshipping rooms for every single religion.

Spoiler

Mods, is this kind of post accepted?

You realized that you forgot to take the SIM Tray Opener at the previous floor (@SuperMiiBrother's fault anyways, he took control of the hypothetical persona previously). And you got nothing to open the SIM tray since your paperclip you brought in your pocket without yourself noticing had been sucked into a black hole you one time ago passed by.

You freaked out. While you're going up to the next floor.

you realize that you can use your finger nail to pull out the little cart.

you broke your nail tho 

(next person gets to say what sim cards)

Floor 5153: you realize that you've crossed dimensions several times and you have no reception... that and you have no one to call... so its pointless

you see stairs near you and go up another floor

Floor 5154 :

You decided to use both Celcom & Verizon SIM Cards.

You found a McDonalds restaurant, you're about to go there but you realize you're fasting.
floor 5155: you see a large red planet out the window. DUNA!
